title: [Poem] We Could Truly Live in Ecstasy...
report: To follow is a very delightful poem that was recited to me while enjoying the experience with several friends one evening. It is a poem written especially about ecstacy and how the world could benefit from its beautiful effects. I knew when I heard it I would be memorizing it to share with anyone and everyone that would listen and believe that with people loving one another around the world, we could all truly live in ecstacy...
ANXIETY NOW, CAN'T STAND OR SIT,
JUST WAIT, DON'T WORRY, IT WILL HIT!
EVERYONE LOVES, NO HATE TO HIDE.
EVERYTHING'S GOOD, THERE IS NO WRONG,
IF THE WHOLE WORLD SWALLOWED IT,
WORLD PEACE I HAVE A VISION,
THERE IS A GOD CALLED XTC!
